QuestData.Title: Find Their Words
QuestData.Description:
This portal will get you quickly back to the outpost.
When there, present the orders to Akru.
Her knowledge is vast, she will be able to discern the truth within.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Orders from Nazjatar to Akru at Seekers' Outpost.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Deliver the Orders from Nazjatar to Akru for decryption.
